name: bibcnrs-button
description: BibCNRS button for a short access to the fulltext shown near the found DOI in the visited pages

scripts.patchmanifest:1: jq ".version=$(jq .version package.json)" dist/manifest.json > dist/manifest.tmp.json && mv dist/manifest.tmp.json dist/manifest.json
scripts.patchmanifest:2: jq ".name=$(jq .name package.json)" dist/manifest.json > dist/manifest.tmp.json && mv dist/manifest.tmp.json dist/manifest.json
scripts.patchmanifest:3: jq ".description=$(jq .description package.json)" dist/manifest.json > dist/manifest.tmp.json && mv dist/manifest.tmp.json dist/manifest.json
